source:
filePath = 'https://asdevdmaicstor01.dfs.core.windows.net/committee/committeeLand/Committee_Dashboards_Feedback_202105_202204_20220622.xlsx'
sasToken = '?sv=2020-10-02&ss=btqf&srt=sco&st=2022-07-05T06%3A47%3A14Z&se=2040-06-01T06%3A47%3A00Z&sp=rwdxl&sig=mBl%2Bl3Phz%2Bhgt7gg3i2EWueohnIlM%2B8tbBUwIvWwTy8%3D'
sheetName = 'Feedback'
etlRunID = '1'
tableName = 'TBL_REF_MAN_QMI_COMMITTEE_FEEDBACK'
schema = 'RDV'
database = 'aztsaasdmaicdevsqlpools01'
server = 'az-tsa-as-dmaic-dev-synapse-01.sql.azuresynapse.net'

strSQL = ("SELECT \n" 
"\tCONCAT(Reporting_Period,'|',Feedback_ID) as MAN_QMI_COMMITTEE_FEEDBACK_BK\n"
"\t,Source as SOURCE_NAME\n"
"\t,Reporting_Period as REPORTING_PERIOD_NAME\n"
"\t,Feedback_ID as FEEDBACK_ID\n"
"\t,Source_Feedback_ID as SOURCE_FEEDBACK_ID\n"
"\t,Date_of_Feedback as FEEDBACK_DATE\n"
"\t,Portfolio as PORTFOLIO\n"
"\t,Mission_Expression as MISSION_EXPRESSION\n"
"\t,Stream_Department as STREAM_DEPARTMENT\n"
"\t,Specific_Stream as SPECIFIC_STREAM\n"
"\t,Site_Name as SITE_NAME\n"
"\t,State as STATE_CODE\n"
"\t,Feedback_Description as FEEDBACK_DESCRIPTION\n"
"\t,Type_of_Feedback as TYPE_OF_FEEDBACK\n"
"\t,Client_Involvement_Type as CLIENT_INVOLVEMENT_TYPE\n"
"\t,Feedback_made_by as FEEDBACK_MADE_BY\n"
"\t,Funding_Body_Regulatory_Body_Ombudsman_Name as FUNDING_BODY_REGULATORY_BODY_OMBUDSMAN_NAME\n"
"\t,Feedback_Group as FEEDBACK_GROUP\n"
"\t,Feedback_Type as FEEDBACK_TYPE\n"
"\t,Compliment_Rating as COMPLIMENT_RATING\n"
"\t,Actions_Taken as ACTIONS\n"
"\t,Status as STATUS\n"
"\t,Appendix_Flag as APPENDIX_FLAG\n"

"\t,'SolvSafety' as ETL_RECORD_SOURCE\n"
"\t,true AS ETL_RECORD_IS_ACTIVE\n"
"\t,'A' as ETL_RECORD_STATUS\n"
"\t,'"+ etlRunID +"' as ETL_INSERT_RUN_ID\n"
"\t,'"+ etlRunID +"' as ETL_UPDATE_RUN_ID\n"
"\t,to_timestamp('"+strloadTime+"') as ETL_RECORD_INSERT_DATETIME\n"
"\t,to_timestamp('"+strloadTime+"') as ETL_RECORD_UPDATE_DATETIME\n"
"\t,'"+etlLoadID+"' AS ETL_LOAD_ID\n"
"FROM\n"
"\t "+tempTableName)

path = filePath + sasToken
pdf = readexcel(path,sheetName)
pdf = pdf.replace({np.nan: None})

pdf_schema = StructType([StructField("Source", StringType(), True)\
                    ,StructField("Reporting_Period", StringType(), True)\
                    ,StructField("Feedback_ID", StringType(), True)\
                    ,StructField("Source_Feedback_ID", StringType(), True)\
                    ,StructField("Date_of_Feedback", DateType(), True)\
                    ,StructField("Portfolio", StringType(), True)\
                    ,StructField("Mission_Expression", StringType(), True)\
                    ,StructField("Stream_Department", StringType(), True)\
                    ,StructField("Specific_Stream", StringType(), True)\
                    ,StructField("Site_Name", StringType(), True)\
                    ,StructField("State", StringType(), True)\
                    ,StructField("Feedback_Description", StringType(), True)\
                    ,StructField("Type_of_Feedback", StringType(), True)\
                    ,StructField("Client_Involvement_Type", StringType(), True)\
                    ,StructField("Feedback_made_by", StringType(), True)\
                    ,StructField("Funding_Body_Regulatory_Body_Ombudsman_Name", StringType(), True)\
                    ,StructField("Feedback_Group", StringType(), True)\
                    ,StructField("Feedback_Type", StringType(), True)\
                    ,StructField("Compliment_Rating", StringType(), True)\
                    ,StructField("Actions_Taken", StringType(), True)\
                    ,StructField("Status", StringType(), True)\
                    ,StructField("Appendix_Flag", StringType(), True)])

df = spark.createDataFrame(pdf, schema=pdf_schema)


df.createOrReplaceTempView(tempTableName)
sqlDF = spark.sql(strSQL)
#display(sqlDF)
